duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop sound, cost-effective strategies for the purchasing of materials and services used in the business.

Manage inquiries and support services throughout the stage of product development, filing pre-development, lab scale development, prototype development, exhibit batches, submission of ANDA, validation through commercialization.
Identify opportunities to leverage firm spend/volume and implement long-term vendor rebates.
Forecast requirements and order products to meet sales demands as required.
Collaborate with business unit requestors to ensure purchases meet the quality, cost, timelines, and functionality requirements.
Conduct procurement activities within Lupin’s applicable policies and procedures, and applicable laws and regulations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Finance, Science, Supply Chain or a related field.
